Bring life to everything you imagine and communicate.
Turn your thoughts into reality.

hero.title:
Breathe Life Into
Every Soul
hero.description:
Bring new life to humans, animals, and objects through AI.
Meet your closest friend and most special companion.

main_detail.human_subtitle:
Create the perfect AI persona with a heart like yours,
share memories together
main_detail.human_detail_description:
No more just missing the ones you love.

ANIMA breathes AI soul into the person in your photo,
so you can talk, share memories, and create new moments anytime.

Your closest friend returns.
main_detail.pet_subtitle:
Experience the purest connection,
make your dream of communicating with pets come true
main_detail.pet_detail_description:
That pet who crossed the rainbow bridge, still missed today.

ANIMA remembers the moments you shared,
and lets you meet again whenever you want.

The purest connection starts again.
main_detail.object_subtitle:
Breathe life into anything you want,
connect life and knowledge, everything you imagine becomes real

connect life and knowledge, everything you imagine becomes real

first_time.greeting:
Hello! üëã
I'm SAGE. Welcome to ANIMA! üí´

ANIMA is a special place where you can breathe new life into your precious photos and talk to them again.

Before we start, let's have an important conversation!
first_time.terms_summary:
üîí Promise for Safe Use

For safe use of ANIMA, there are 3 promises you must keep:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Upload Your Own Photos
Photos uploaded must be your own or photos for which you fully own the copyright and portrait rights.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Responsibility
If you use someone else's photo without permission, all legal responsibility lies with you.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Report & Block
If inappropriate use is reported, the content will be immediately blocked and the account may be suspended.

By keeping these promises, we can have a safe and enjoyable ANIMA journey together! üíñ
first_time.terms_agreed:
Thank you! üéâ
Now we can start our journey together!
first_time.terms_disagreed:
Unfortunately, you cannot use the service without agreeing to the terms. üò¢

Feel free to contact us if you have any questions!
